statements: SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE temperature > 25.0
SELECT location, humidity FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT id, image_id, temperature FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE humidity < 60.0 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%'
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, date, temperature FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT location, humidity, temperature FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalMonitoringData WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%'
SELECT * FROM environmental_changes WHERE change_type = 'land cover'
SELECT location, date FROM environmental_changes ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date, location FROM environmental_changes WHERE location LIKE '%forest%'
SELECT date, location, change_type FROM environmental_changes ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY date
SELECT id, date, location FROM environmental_changes WHERE change_type = 'Temperature Increase' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, change_type FROM environmental_changes WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT change_type FROM environmental_changes ORDER BY change_type ASC
SELECT ec.id, hd.date, ec.location, hd.data_value FROM environmental_changes AS ec JOIN historical_data AS hd ON ec.date = hd.date ORDER BY hd.date DESC
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name = 'SatelliteA';
SELECT data_id, location, value FROM HistoricalData ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT change_id, change_type FROM EnvironmentalChanges WHERE location = 'CityA' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalChanges WHERE change_type = 'Climate Change' AND location = 'ForestA';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT image_id, satellite_name FROM SatelliteImages WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT location, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE data_type = 'temperature' AND value > 30
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalChanges WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY change_date
SELECT image_id, satellite_name, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name = 'S1'
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery_data;
SELECT image_id, location, cloud_cover FROM satellite_imagery_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Lidar';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location, type, magnitude FROM environmental_changes WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE location = 'New York' AND result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery_data WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_id, sensor_type FROM satellite_imagery_data WHERE cloud_cover < 0.5 AND location = 'Paris';
SELECT location, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM historical_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM environmental_changes ec JOIN historical_data hd ON ec.location = hd.location WHERE ec.magnitude > 0.8 ORDER BY ec.date ASC, hd.date DESC;
SELECT ar.analysis_type, COUNT(ar.result_id) AS num_results FROM analysis_results ar WHERE ar.result LIKE '%significant%' GROUP BY ar.analysis_type HAVING num_results > 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, satellite_name FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM historical_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT * FROM environmental_changes WHERE change_type = 'earthquake' ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_result, analysis_timestamp FROM analysis_results WHERE result_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_id = 'abcd1234';
SELECT image_id, image_timestamp FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite-A' ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_id, satellite_name FROM satellite_images WHERE image_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT data_id, location, temperature FROM historical_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT change_id, location, change_description FROM environmental_changes ORDER BY change_timestamp ASC;
